DOC.brief_summary: Objective : Compare benefit Kinesio Taping Inhibitory Treatment Techniques Cervical , Thoracic Lumbar Spine Patients Fibromyalgia Syndrome ( FMS ) . Study Design : A single-blind randomized control trial conduct patient FMS . Setting : Clinical setting . Methods : Sixty-four subject FMS randomly assign experimental group receive kinesio tap inhibitory treatment technique , control group exercise electrical stimulation therapy .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed Fibromyalgia Syndrome . Limitation usual activity due pain least 1 day previous 30 day . Agreement attend evening therapy session . Nonpractice regular physical activity . A history surgery . The presence comorbid condition ( e.g. , morbid obesity , inflammatory disease , irritable bowel syndrome interstitial cystitis ) . A history whiplash injury . Severe physical disability . uncontrolled endocrine disorder ( e.g. , hyperthyroidism , diabetes ) ; 6 ) illness ( e.g. , schizophrenia substance abuse ) . The use medication asneeded analgesic ( exclude longterm narcotic ) . Malignancy . Psychiatric disorder . A score â‰¥ 9 point Beck depression inventory .
